content: head measurement approx 54/56 - 57/59 cm appr 21½ - 22 3/4 materials drops silke-alpaca from garnstudio 150 g for both sizes color no 2920 orange mix 100 g for both sizes color no 3609 red or use drops nepal from garnstudio 150 g for both sizes colour no 2920 orange 100 g for both sizes colour no 3620 red drops crochet hook size 6 mm us j/10 or the crochet hook size needed to obtain correct crochet gauge
